content:
### Bug fixes

* **core**: make the email for user management case insensitive.
* **core**: add `rawBody` for XML requests.
* **editor**: fix a glitch that caused dropdowns to break after adding expressions.
* **editor**: reset text input value when closed with `Esc`.
* [Discourse node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.discourse.md): fix an issue that was causing incomplete results when getting posts. Added a credentials test.
* [Zendesk Trigger node](/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.zendesktrigger.md): remove deprecated targets, replace with webhooks.
* [Zoho node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.zohocrm.md): fix pagination issue.
